body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Rivera Motors. My name is Henry Rivera. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there. My name is Dorothy Cooper.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Dorothy. To assist you better, may I please have your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. It's seven seven zero four five six two three one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy. And can you also provide me with your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's d dot cooper at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Dorothy. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, nothing else. I'm just sad about the return process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Dorothy. We will do our best to help you with that. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
